org.smooks.delivery.dom.serialize

Class TextSerializerVisitor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.smooks.delivery.dom.serialize.DefaultDOMSerializerVisitor
      • org.smooks.delivery.dom.serialize.TextSerializerVisitor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ContentHandler, DOMSerializerVisitor, BeforeVisitor, SaxNgVisitor, SAXVisitBefore, SAXVisitor, SerializerVisitor, Visitor

    public class TextSerializerVisitor
extends DefaultDOMSerializerVisitor
implements SAXVisitBefore, BeforeVisitor
    Write a <text> element.

    Basically just drops the <text> tags.

    Author:
    tom.fennelly@jboss.com
